Can you also tell me some tips for making them chewier?
Plan: 1) Search for tips on making chewy chocolate chip cookies. 2) Return the tips.
Searching for tips on making chewy chocolate chip cookies.
To make chewy cookies, try adding more brown sugar, using melted butter, and chilling the dough before baking.
